mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.category_id, t.platform_code as platform_game_code, t.platform_en_name as platform_game_en_name, t.platform_cn_name as platform_game_cn_name, t.picture_path as game_picture_path, t.volatility, t.is_start, t.is_hot_show, t.parent_name, m.is_virtual, m.platform_code, m.platform_en_name, m.platform_cn_name, m.picture_path FROM game_platform t left join game_parent_platform m on t.parent_name=m.platform_code WHERE t.is_start='1' and m.is_start='1' order by t.sort_number asc
